readable.title: 1389651420_8d95d8f6ed
readable.content: A boy stands beside a railing at a go kart track . A little boy grinning with a go cart in the background . A little boy in a red shirt is making a face into the camera while waiting at a go cart track . A little boy is standing in line for go-karts . The small boy is excited he will be riding a go-cart .
